    • Method Detail

      • matchesSearchCriteria

        protected abstract boolean matchesSearchCriteria(T message)
        Checks if the message matches preliminary search criteria.
        Parameters:
        message - The message read from the topic.
        Returns:
        True if the message matches search criteria, false otherwise.

      • processMessage

        protected abstract void processMessage(MessageEnvelope<T> envelope)
        Applies custom filters on the message and if successfully verified, adds it to the results map.
        Parameters:
        envelope - Message inside an envelope in PLAIN mode.

      • supplyMessageListener

        protected abstract MessageListener<T> supplyMessageListener()
        Supplies message listener for messages of specified type.
        Returns:
        The MessageListener instance.

      • execute

        public void execute(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorClient mirrorClient)
        Resolves queries defined in implementing classes against a mirror node.
        Parameters:
        mirrorClient - The mirror node client.

      • whenFinished

        public MessageResolver<T> whenFinished(java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MessageEnvelope<T>>> handler)
        Defines a handler for resolution results. This will be called when the resolution process is finished.
        Parameters:
        handler - The results handler.
        Returns:
        This resolver instance.

      • onError

        public MessageResolver<T> onError(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> handler)
        Defines a handler for errors when they happen during resolution.
        Parameters:
        handler - The error handler.
        Returns:
        This resolver instance.

      • setTimeout

        public MessageResolver<T> setTimeout(long timeout)
        Defines a maximum time in milliseconds to wait for new messages from the topic. Default is 30 seconds.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds to wait for new messages from the topic.
        Returns:
        This resolver instance.

      • onDecrypt

        public MessageResolver<T> onDecrypt(java.util.function.BiFunction<byte[],java.time.Instant,byte[]> decrypter)
        Defines decryption function that decrypts submitted the message after consensus was reached. Decryption function must accept a byte array of encrypted message and an Instant that is its consensus timestamp, If decrypter is not specified, encrypted messages will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        decrypter - The decrypter to use.
        Returns:
        This resolver instance.

      • validate

        protected void validate(Validator validator)
        Runs validation logic of the resolver's configuration.
        Parameters:
        validator - The errors validator.
